get.description:
The Docker Distribution will serve the latest version of a Repository if
``repository`` is specified. The Docker Distribution will serve a specific
repository version if ``repository_version``. Note that **either**
``repository`` or ``repository_version`` can be set on a Docker
Distribution, but not both.

parameters.name: name__in
parameters.description: Filter results where name is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: base_path__contains
parameters.description: Filter results where base_path contains value

parameters.name: base_path__icontains
parameters.description: Filter results where base_path contains value

parameters.name: base_path__in
parameters.description: Filter results where base_path is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude from the response.

get.description:
Docker remotes represent an external repository that implements the Docker
Registry API. Docker remotes support deferred downloading by configuring
the ``policy`` field.  ``on_demand`` and ``streamed`` policies can provide
significant disk space savings.

parameters.name: name__in
parameters.description: Filter results where name is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated__lt
parameters.description: Filter results where pulp_last_updated is less than value

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated__lte
parameters.description: Filter results where pulp_last_updated is less than or equal to value

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated__gt
parameters.description: Filter results where pulp_last_updated is greater than value

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated__gte
parameters.description: Filter results where pulp_last_updated is greater than or equal to value

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated__range
parameters.description: Filter results where pulp_last_updated is between two comma separated values

parameters.name: pulp_last_updated
parameters.description: ISO 8601 formatted dates are supported

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

media_type.title: Media type
media_type.description: Docker media type of the file

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

media_type.title: Media type
media_type.description: Docker media type of the file

listed_manifests.description: Manifests that are referenced by this Manifest List

items.description: Manifests that are referenced by this Manifest List

config_blob.title: Config blob
config_blob.description: Blob that contains configuration for this Manifest

blobs.description: Blobs that are referenced by this Manifest

items.description: Blobs that are referenced by this Manifest

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

base_path.title: Base path
base_path.description: The base (relative) path component of the published url. Avoid paths that                     overlap with other distribution base paths (e.g. "foo" and "foo/bar")

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The latest RepositoryVersion for this Repository will be served.

registry_path.title: Registry path
registry_path.description: The Registry hostame:port/name/ to use with docker pull command defined by this distribution.

source_repository.title: Repository
source_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content from.

source_repository_version.title: Source repository version
source_repository_version.description: A URI of the repository version to copy content from.

destination_repository.title: Repository
destination_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content to.

digests.description: A list of manifest digests to copy.

media_types.description: A list of media_types to copy.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to add content.

content_units.description: A list of content units to operate on.

source_repository.title: Repository
source_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content from.

source_repository_version.title: Source repository version
source_repository_version.description: A URI of the repository version to copy content from.

destination_repository.title: Repository
destination_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content to.

names.description: A list of tag names to copy.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of an external content source.

ssl_ca_certificate.title: Ssl ca certificate
ssl_ca_certificate.description: A string containing the PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_client_certificate.title: Ssl client certificate
ssl_client_certificate.description: A string containing the PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_client_key.title: Ssl client key
ssl_client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_validation.title: Ssl validation
ssl_validation.description: If True, SSL peer validation must be performed.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to be used for authentication when syncing.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to be used for authentication when syncing.

pulp_last_updated.title: Pulp last updated
pulp_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the remote.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description:
immediate - All manifests and blobs are downloaded and saved during a sync.
        on_demand - Only tags and manifests are downloaded. Blobs are not
                    downloaded until they are requested for the first time by a client.
        streamed - Blobs are streamed to the client with every request and never saved.

whitelist_tags.title: Whitelist tags
whitelist_tags.description:
A comma separated string of tags to sync.
        Example:

        latest,1.27.0

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

mirror.title: Mirror
mirror.description: If ``True``, synchronization will remove all content that is not present in the remote repository. If ``False``, sync will be additive only.
